attributes.action: Bring back the death penalty for all murderes and all child sex offenders
attributes.additional_details: I don’t think it’s fair that pedophiles are released from prison and checked on twice a year. Murderes and terrorists are jailed a life for a life
attributes.background: The death penalty should be given to all murderers or child sex offenders

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Hold a referendum on restoring the Death Penalty for murder
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/709623

Bring back capital punishment for the rape of a child
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711979

Bring back the death penalty for homicide of a child
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/709710
